To fill the nation's technical talent shortage with
our nation's finest.

- TAP Deck Overview


  1. Software Mentor Protégé Program
  2. Software Conference Scholarships
  3. Code School Scholarships
  4. Military Veterans Technical Talent Pipeline

Software Mentorship


Providing transitioning military, veterans and their families peer-to-peer software mentorship coaching and guidance for gainful employment as software developers.


Join our growing military veterans community at https://operationcode.org/join.


Hardware/Software Requirements: Modern Computer, Internet Connection, Chrome Browser, iTerm2 and Atom.

Scholarships


We help bridge the gap between the VA and Code Schools and Code Conferences

Employer Services

  1. Resume Support
  2. Placement Services
  3. Apprenticeship
  4. Veteran Network for Skill Sets

How do we do this?


By remaining decentralized and maintaining a world wide presence.

We hope to ensure that your GI bill is accredited at every school.

Operation Code assists veterans with the paperwork and enrollment.

We want to see you succeed.

Advocacy

  • "We will defend" veterans from predators and scams from non-legitimate Code Schools.
  • We ensure Code Schools are legitimate.
  • Code Schools are non-regulated. We aide in navigating the waters.

Nationwide Fundraisers

Operation Code Gala - November 10, 2018

Start Now!

  • The earlier you start, the sooner you can make the transition.

What are your long term goals?

  • This is important to write down.
  • These may change as you learn, but it will help give you direction.
